instruction: The patient reports increased intensity of pain despite starting hydroxychloroquine. Some days are better than others, indicating variability in symptoms.

attributes.narrative: The patient reports increased intensity of pain despite starting hydroxychloroquine. Some days are better than others, indicating variability in symptoms.

instruction: The patient is instructed to continue taking folic acid regularly to help with side effects.

attributes.comment: The patient is instructed to continue taking folic acid regularly to help with side effects.
